author: IGN
description:
Pull out your party hats, DC fans, because James Gunn’s  Superman film is now in theaters. The first film installment in the new DC Universe franchise is entering its opening weekend with  mostly positive reviews, including an  8/10 from IGN’s Tom Jorgensen. After the previous DCEU  flamed out at the box office and with critics, Gunn’s relaunched DCU is at least starting on the right foot. Yet although there’s plenty to praise, like the great cast, optimistic tone, and David Corenswet’s Clark Kent and Rachel Brosnahan’s Lois Lane having actual chemistry, the MVP of the film is Nicholas Hoult as perennial Superman nemesis Lex Luthor, who is a fantastic character both on the page and in Hoult’s performance.

Why is he such a standout? Because he’s petty as hell. James Gunn and co. understand that Luthor–as well as most supervillains, but him especially–should be petty people driven by emotional impulse instead of grandiose ideology. Unlike other recent comic book movie villains who the
title: James Gunn's Superman Unlocks the Trick to Supervillains With the New Lex Luthor

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Disney and Pixar's Hoppers teaser trailer for this upcoming animated comedy film. Hoppers features the voice talents of Piper Curda, Bobby Moynihan and Jon Hamm. 

In Hoppers, scientists have discovered how to “hop” human consciousness into lifelike robotic animals, allowing people to communicate with animals as animals! Using the new technology, Mabel (Curda) will uncover mysteries within the animal world that are beyond anything she could have imagined. It is produced by Nicole Paradis Grindle.

Hoppers, directed by Daniel Chong, opens in theaters on March 6, 2026.
title: Hoppers - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Piper Curda, Bobby Moynihan, Jon Hamm

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for EA Sports FC 26, the next installment in the Football (soccer) simulation franchise developed by EA Sports. Players will take to the pitch once more to lay it all out in the name of rivalry, competition, and victory. Compete with the world's best teams with new enhancements and features for fans and newcomers alike to enjoy. EA Sports FC 26 is launching on September 26 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, Amazon Luna, and PC (Steam).
title: EA Sports FC 26 - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Cyberpunk 2077's Patch 2.3 update is available July 17, 2025 on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series consoles (with the Nintendo Switch 2 version coming at a later date), and CD Projekt Red has once again expanded players' customization options in the game as they explore Night City in style. Here's an overview of all the biggest changes in Cyberpunk's 2.3 update.
This update adds four new vehicles, including a weaponized truck and a bike from the Cyberpunk: Kickdown comic. Autodrive and Delamain taxi services let you travel the city hands-free, with cinematic camera support. Vehicle customization now supports 32 rides with over 370 new paint jobs. Photo Mode gets major upgrades with new NPCs, weather controls, outfit changes, and more. Plus, FSR 3.1, VRR, and Mac support bring new performance options to all platforms.

Patch notes:
https://www.cyberpunk.net/en/news/51674/update-2-3-patch-notes

REDStream:
https://www.youtube.com/live/aFLKoZaHak8

Timecodes
00:00 - Intro
00:35 - New Vehicles and
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Biggest Changes in Patch 2.3 Update

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Season 3 Battle Pass: Power of the Phoenix Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit team-based action hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can earn a suite of new cosmetic rewards by working through the Battle Pass for Season 3 titled Power of the Phoenix, including symbiote versions of Jeff the Shark, symbiote Spider-Man, and more, with 10 new costumes to acquire. Season 3 of Marvel Rivals is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Season 3 Battle Pass: Power of the Phoenix Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Uncaged Fury' Teaser Trailer for Mortal Kombat 2, the upcoming action film based on the hit Mortal Kombat game IP distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. Take a look at the in-universe film trailer for Uncaged Fury starring the one and only Johnny Cage, portrayed by Karl Urban. 

Uncaged Fury sees the legendary Johnny Cage take on a band of goons with ease, making use of pipes, fast-paced combat skills, and an aura unlike any other.

Mortal Kombat 2 is in theaters on October 24.
title: Mortal Kombat 2 - Official 'Uncaged Fury' Teaser Trailer (2025) Karl Urban

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Customization & Gadgets Trailer for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds, an arcade racing game developed by SEGA. Players will be able to race at high speeds with over 40 vehicles, 70+ gadgets, and 100+ vehicle parts & decals to choose from. Make use of the Giant Rocket Punch to clear a way to First Place, Air Trick Expert to gain more points and a speed boost, and more to reign victorious. Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is launching on September 25 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Official Customization & Gadgets Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Summer Special Event 2025 Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit team-based action hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players will be able to gear up for the Summer Special Event in Marvel Rivals full of summer-themed costumes to earn. Log in to receive the Thor Worthy Waves costume for free alongside Luna Snow’s Cool Summer costume and The Thing's Sunshine Thing costume by upgrading to the Premium track. The Summer Special Event 2025 runs from July 17 through August 15.
title: Marvel Rivals - Official Summer Special Event 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get another look at Dead Take in this new trailer for the upcoming first-person escape-room-style horror set in a luxurious and private Hollywood mansion belonging to a powerful film exec. Dead Take is a dark psychological horror about two actors vying for the same role. As Chase (Neil Newbon), enter the mansion and solve puzzles as you explore in search of your friend, fellow actor Vinny (Ben Starr). Are you ready to take your shot? Dead Take will be available on Steam and the Epic Games Store on July 31, 2025.
title: Dead Take - Official Release Date Trailer (ft. Ben Starr, Neil Newbon, Laura Bailey & More)

author: IGN
description: Check out the Reveal Trailer for Liminal Exit, an immersive puzzle simulation game developed by LittleRedDread. Players will explore the backrooms of a looping building with no sense of direction, let alone a way out. Discover inexplicable anomalies, break the loops that remain, and escape the liminal spaces once and for all. Liminal Exit is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Liminal Exit - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the new playable demo for Bleak Haven, a new Unreal Engine 5-powered first-person survival horror game that its team says is heavily inspired by the Resident Evil series as well as The Ritual. It's a story-driven, cinematic single-player experience with puzzles, weapon crafting, and brutal combat. It's in development for PC. Check out the demo on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3566840/Bleak_Haven/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Bleak Haven – Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for After The Hunt, a crime drama thriller distributed by Amazon MGM Studios. Don't miss the suspenseful trailer for After The Hunt, releasing in theaters in October 2025.

A college professor finds herself at a personal and professional crossroads when a star pupil levels an accusation against one of her colleagues and a dark secret from her own past threatens to come to light.

After The Hunt stars Ayo Edebiri, Andrew Garfield, Julia Roberts, Chloe Sevigny, Michael Stuhlbarg, and more. The film is directed by Luca Guadagnino and written by Nora Garrett.

After The Hunt is in theaters in October 2025.

#ign #movie #AfterTheHunt #juliaroberts #ayoedebiri #amazonmgm
title: After The Hunt - Official Trailer (2025) Ayo Edebiri, Andrew Garfield, Julia Roberts

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1, the latest DLC for the anime open-world action RPG developed by CyberConnect 2. 

Join Goku and his friends as they embark on an adventure through the Demon Realm packed with epic battles and the first part of a grand story. Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1 for Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#ign #dragonballz #gaming #dragonballzkakarot
title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1 - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Construction worker Chris (Nnamdi Asomugha) is prepared to do whatever he can to build a solid life for his family, yet his plans are thrown into disarray after a mysterious woman appears in their new home late one night. By the time police arrive, the intruder is lying on the kitchen floor unconscious, a knife in her hand, and it falls to steadfast Detective Carlsen (Melissa Leo) to uncover the truth about what happened. 

Under questioning, Chris, his wife Alex (Aja Naomi King), and their young daughters Ryley (Aiden Price) and Kendra (Amari Price) close ranks, hoping to safeguard one another’s secrets—but the choices they make lead to consequences graver than they could ever imagine.

Directed by Nnamdi Asomugha and written by Mark Duplass and Nnamdi Asomugha, The Knife opens in theaters August 15, 2025.
title: The Knife - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Nnamdi Asomugha, Manny Jacinto

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first minutes of Ready or Not played on a PlayStation 5. 

Ready or Not is a tactical first-person shooter which places you in the boots of an elite SWAT team, tasked with diffusing hostile situations in intense, claustrophobic environments. It's also kind of a horror game.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
title: Ready or Not - PlayStation 5 Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
"Wang Qing arrayed his troop north of the ford, fought till blood bled twilight red—he and his men perished upright. He was 53.” General Wang Qing takes the spotlight in this Where Winds Meet story trailer for the upcoming open-world action-adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise. Where Winds Meet will be available on PC and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2025. A Final Playtest begins on July 25, 2025, with sign-ups available now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Where Winds Meet - Official General Wang Qing Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this segment from Nintendo Voice Chat's special tribute episode, Logan Plant and Peer Schneider dive deep into this amazing story that showcases Iwata's dedication to ensuring great games reached players. From his early days at HAL Laboratory to his role in saving one of Nintendo's most experimental and beloved RPGs, discover how Iwata's technical expertise and leadership helped preserve a gaming masterpiece for future generations.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: How Satoru Iwata Saved EarthBound - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at six minutes of gameplay from Luto, an upcoming psychological horror game in which you play as someone not only unable to leave your house, but trying to get out sends you deeper into the terrifying unknown. Luto will be released for PC on July 21. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1729740/Luto/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Luto: 6 Minutes of Psychological Horror Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong Bananza reviewed by Logan Plant on Nintendo Switch 2.

The leader of the bunch is finally back to kick some tail in Donkey Kong Bananza, a brilliant successor to Super Mario Odyssey and a smashing return for a classic Nintendo character. It was a bold choice to build the Switch 2’s first 3D platformer around DK instead of Mario, but it’s proven to be the best decision Nintendo could’ve made. DK’s satisfying, expressive movement and powerful, dynamic abilities create a truly groundbreaking adventure. The ambitious, destructible layers of this underground world are densely packed with satisfying collectibles, abundant charm, and clever challenges that never seem to run out of smart ideas, even long after the credits have rolled. Bananza is a constant crescendo across its 20-hour campaign and beyond, with puzzle-platforming concepts that only grow richer as DK and Pauline dive deeper toward the Planet Core. Every element comes together in complete harmony to create Nintendo’s
title: Donkey Kong Bananza Review

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Console Release Date Announcement Trailer for Kaku: Ancient Seal, an action-adventure open-world RPG platformer developed by Bingobell. Players will embody Kaku, a young and solitary hero who sets out to battle fierce creatures, uncover forgotten mysteries, and restore balance to a universe on the brink of collapse after the elements turn against nature itself. Engage with the game's deep combat system, traverse through different biomes, and earn new abilities through the game's skill trees. Kaku: Ancient Seal is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S on October 17, with the game being available now for PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kaku: Ancient Seal - Official Console Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today’s Daily Fix: Microsoft has announced the second wave of titles coming to Xbox Game Pass this month. Highlights include Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, Grounded 2, RoboCop: Rogue City, and the return of High on Life. Also, Nintendo gives us a look at what Donkey Kong Bananza looked like on Switch 1 before eventually moving development to Switch 2. And lastly, another game disappearing from digital storefronts, John Wick Hex will be gone from stores in just a few days.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Xbox Game Pass Announces Wave 2 for July 2025 - IGN Daily Fix
